alfredsnippet.snippet:
Hey NAME,

I am the campus director at The Iron Yard and I would love to followup with your interest in learning to become a developer. 

We are currently interviewing for our courses that begin on August 24th. I'd love to extend an invitation to chat a bit more about how our program might fit your needs! 

Schedule a time to chat here - https://calendly.com/dorton/tiy_informational_austin

We recently completed our last semester and students presented their projects during an incredibly successful demo day.  

If you're ready to dive in, please see our website page on our offerings for more details and links to apply to each course:

http://theironyard.com/apply/

Let's chat soon about next steps

Thanks,
alfredsnippet.name: Austin Followup
